about_the_game:
This pack includes:

All players who buy the pack get a unique garage of The Four Horsemen as a gift!
  • - Armoured car “Death Machine”
  • - Unique background and logo of the Horseman
  • - Unique epic cabin “The call”
  • - Unique portrait of Daniel Reyes aka Death
  • - 4000 in-game coins

Additionally, the player gets:
  • - “Death” structural parts
  • - Weapon: Grenadier drone — 2 pcs., AD-12 Falcon
  • - Unique decor "Twin exhaust", 2 pcs.
  • - A set of unique stickers
  • - Sprays with unique paint “Cold steel” and “Epitaph”
  • - “Shiv (ST)”, 6 pcs.
  • - “Chameleon”
  • - Rare generator “Big G”
  • - Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55

After purchase and return to garage the game will offer you to automatically create new vehicle. You can also do this later - open blueprints menu, pick the vehicle and press "Load".

Purchasing a pack gives the player early access to some structural faction parts. These parts will become available immediately upon purchase and are not re-issued once the corresponding reputation level is reached. For some parts you can only have one set of them on the account. When purchasing multiple packs with same parts they do not stack!

Coins - is an in-game currency, which is used to buy vehicle parts from other users in the market and to pay the rent for the workbench to produce new parts. Note! If you purchase several packs, coins included in them stack!
detailed_description:
This pack includes:

All players who buy the pack get a unique garage of The Four Horsemen as a gift!
  • - Armoured car “Death Machine”
  • - Unique background and logo of the Horseman
  • - Unique epic cabin “The call”
  • - Unique portrait of Daniel Reyes aka Death
  • - 4000 in-game coins

Additionally, the player gets:
  • - “Death” structural parts
  • - Weapon: Grenadier drone — 2 pcs., AD-12 Falcon
  • - Unique decor "Twin exhaust", 2 pcs.
  • - A set of unique stickers
  • - Sprays with unique paint “Cold steel” and “Epitaph”
  • - “Shiv (ST)”, 6 pcs.
  • - “Chameleon”
  • - Rare generator “Big G”
  • - Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55

After purchase and return to garage the game will offer you to automatically create new vehicle. You can also do this later - open blueprints menu, pick the vehicle and press "Load".

Purchasing a pack gives the player early access to some structural faction parts. These parts will become available immediately upon purchase and are not re-issued once the corresponding reputation level is reached. For some parts you can only have one set of them on the account. When purchasing multiple packs with same parts they do not stack!

Coins - is an in-game currency, which is used to buy vehicle parts from other users in the market and to pay the rent for the workbench to produce new parts. Note! If you purchase several packs, coins included in them stack!

name: Crossout - Horsemen of Apocalypse: Death (Deluxe Edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible Intel HD Graphics 500 Series / AMD Radeon HD 7000 Series / NVIDIA GeForce 500 Series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible NVIDIA GeForce 960 or higher, AMD R9 280 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
